DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate level single dose CTAP101 change body time ( pharmacokinetics , PK ) CTAP101 affect mineral hormonal balance ( pharmacodynamics , PD ) patient Stage 3 4 chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) vitamin D insufficiency secondary hyperparathyroidism ( SHPT ) .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Safety Pilot Study Single-Dose Oral Intravenous CTAP101 Stage 3 4 Chronic Kidney Disease Subjects
DOC.criteria: Body mass index great equal 18 less equal 40 kg/m2 Plasma iPTH value Stage 3 CKD great equal 70 pg/mL lower equal 1000 pg/mL Plasma iPTH value Stage 4 CKD great equal 110 pg/mL lower equal 1000 pg/mL Adjusted serum total calcium value great 8.4 mg/dL low 10.0 mg/dL Serum phosphorus value great equal 2.5 mg/dL low equal 5.5 mg/dL Serum 25hydroxyvitamin D level great 15 ng/mL low 30 ng/mL Hemoglobin level great equal 10 g/dL Has nephrotic range proteinuria Has liver disease significant hepatic dysfunction Is take Cytochrome P450 3A4 inhibitor inducer Has adult history kidney stone dysphagia Has know history alcohol/controlled substance abuse positive drug abuse screen Currently dialysis Current serious illness cancer , HIV , cardiovascular event hepatitis
